title: Social Strategy Manager
content:
Overview
The objective of the position is to play a leading role in driving Social strategy for the agency across organic and paid channel marketing implementation. This would include Social brand personas, channel/platform plans, content strategy, analytics and intelligence, business optimization, and creative excellence. Critical to the success of this position is the understanding of how Social contributes to brand building and commerce across the customer journey and within the overall brand experience.
 
Key Accountabilities

Social Strategy development
Cultural and consumer connection for brands in Social channels
Best practice enablement and sharing
Integration of Social into the VOJ offering across clients

 
Core Duties

Presentation development and delivery
Social team member support and development
Promotion of Social across the agency
Engagement with senior clients and account service leadership.
Working collaboratively with Account and Creative Teams to inform and build the work through ‘Social-First’ best practice leadership.

 
Qualifications

Track record in social media in marketing, communications planning, organic and paid media in social, brand understanding, breadth of marketing understanding.
Ability to collaborate and work within cross-functional team to achieve aims.
Engaging personality and willingness to continually create solutions.
Open to innovation and overall positive mindset
Demonstrate leadership skill as senior member
Advanced knowledge of working software (Office 365, etc.) 
Japanese Language minimum: Business Proficiency
English Language minimum: Business fluency
At Ogilvy, our people are at the heart of what we do: a creative agency that sparks game-changing ideas across culture and business through collaboration, integrity, and a celebration of self-expression. 
We believe in building powerful teams with purpose. This means hiring and nurturing talent across all races, ethnicities, religions, abilities, sexual orientation, and gender identities – and we relentlessly curate transformative initiatives that make our commitment to fairness, and equity a reality. 
Our ultimate mission is to leave a positive impact on the world, creating a better future for all, while supporting and uplifting the global communities we serve.  This is central to our mantra of Borderless Creativity.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.
